snippet.title: Dino Island - The Four Crystals Trailer
snippet.description:
What is❓

Dino Island - The Four Crystals is a computer game (Windows, Linux and Mac) with pixel art and 2D platform gameplay, its gameplay mechanics with challenges to be overcome with lateral progression, where the player moves the character (Guardian of the blue crystal) to the left and right can also jump, your main objective is to rescue the crystals that were stolen by one of the two magicians who live on the island together with the dinosaurs, for this the crystal guardian needs to go through stages with challenges and collect crystals in your path to not let the crystal destabilize causing damage to the main crystal.
At the end of each part of the island the dino will have to go face the evil wizard who took the crystals, so if he defeats him he will retrieve the crystal in question and go on to the next challenge.

DOWNLOAD 🎮 : https://felipehunter.itch.io/dino-island-the-four-crystals

Power-up
More than 40 levels.
4 Bosses.
Different challenges in each part of the island.
Pixel Art
Platform game.
Gameplay elements (exploding blocks, secret items, new locations).
Achievements for each level (best score, best time).
Bonus levels and fixes and gameplay improvements.
Subtitles in Languages (English, French and Brazilian Portuguese)
Support 1080p and 60fps resolution

DOWNLOAD 🎮 : https://felipehunter.itch.io/dino-island-the-four-crystals
